tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to prototype pollution in the `Utils.ConfigUtils.decompressConfig`, `OtherUtils.mergeIn`, and `OtherUtils.setIn` methods. An attacker could exploit this by injecting properties into object prototypes, potentially altering application behavior or bypassing security controls.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@react-awesome-query-builder/core` library to the patch version.
